mapper.select: SELECT id, name, thumbnail, total, address, startTime, endTime, createTime, summary FROM Ticket WHERE isActive = 1 AND id = #{id} Limit 1

SELECT count(1) FROM UserTicket t1 LEFT JOIN Ticket t2 ON t2.id = t1.ticketId WHERE t1.isActive = 1 AND t2.isActive = 1 AND t1.userId = #{userId} AND t1.isUsed = 0 AND t2.endTime > (select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) * 1000)
